021import net.tnemc.core.TNECore;
022import net.tnemc.core.account.holdings.modify.HoldingsModifier;
023import net.tnemc.core.actions.EconomyResponse;
024import net.tnemc.core.actions.response.GeneralResponse;
025import net.tnemc.core.transaction.Transaction;
026import net.tnemc.core.transaction.TransactionCheck;
027import net.tnemc.core.transaction.TransactionParticipant;
028import net.tnemc.plugincore.core.io.maps.MapKey;
029import org.jetbrains.annotations.NotNull;
030
031/**
032 * TrackingCheck
033 *
034 * @author creatorfromhell
035 * @since 0.1.2.0
036 */
037public class TrackingCheck implements TransactionCheck {
038
039  /**
040   * The unique string-based identifier for this check in order to be able to allow control over
041   * what checks are running, and which ones may not have to be utilized. For instance, we don't
042   * want to waste resources with inventory-based checks when it may not involve item-based
043   * currencies.
044   *
045   * @return The unique identifier for this check.
046   */
047  @Override
048  @MapKey
049  public String identifier() {
050
051    return "track";
052  }
053
054  /**
055   * This method is utilized to run the check on specific
056   * {@link TransactionParticipant participants}. This should return an
057   * {@link EconomyResponse response}.
058   *
059   * @param transaction The {@link Transaction transaction} to perform the check on.
060   * @param participant The {@link TransactionParticipant participant} to perform the check on.
061   * @param modifier    The {@link HoldingsModifier modifier} related to the specific participant.
062   *
063   * @return The {@link EconomyResponse response} for this check. This should include a success or
064   * failure boolean along with a message for why it failed if it did. The messages for this
065   * response are ignored if the check was successful.
066   */
067  @Override
068  public EconomyResponse checkParticipant(final Transaction transaction, @NotNull final TransactionParticipant participant, final HoldingsModifier modifier) {
069
070    if(TNECore.eco().transaction().isTrack() &&
071       modifier.getModifier().compareTo(TNECore.eco().transaction().getAmount()) >= 0) {
072      transaction.setTrack(true);
073    }
074
075    return GeneralResponse.SUCCESS;
076  }
077}
